trans-unit.source: The server you specified {0} does not exist in any subscription in {1}. Either you have signed in with an incorrect account or your server was removed from subscription(s) in this account. Please check your account and try again.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的服务器{0}不存在于{1}的任何订阅中。要么你用一个错误的账户登录，要么你的服务器被从这个账户的订阅中删除。请检查您的账户并重试。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while getting Azure subscriptions: {0}
trans-unit.target: 在获取Azure订阅时，发生了一个错误。{0}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while getting databases from servers of type {0} from {1}
trans-unit.target: 在从{1}的{0}类型的服务器中获取数据库时发生了错误。

trans-unit.source: {0} does not have permission to change the server firewall rule. Try again with a different account that is an Owner or Contributor of the Azure subscription or the server.
trans-unit.target: {0}没有权限更改服务器的防火墙规则。用Azure订阅或服务器的所有者或贡献者的不同账户再试一次。

trans-unit.source: A required dll cannot be loaded. Please repair your application.
trans-unit.target: 无法加载一个所需的dll。请修复您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while creating a new firewall rule.
trans-unit.target: 在创建一个新的防火墙规则时发生了错误。

trans-unit.source: Cannot open a firewall rule for the specified connection type
trans-unit.target: 无法为指定的连接类型打开一个防火墙规则。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while creating a new firewall rule: '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的防火墙规则时发生了一个错误：'{0}'

trans-unit.source: No subscriptions were found for the currently logged in user account.
trans-unit.target: 没有发现当前登录的用户账户有任何订阅。
